2.title: Stalkers.com
2.plot: Robert fights with Catherine and lusts after the new neighbor, Cassie Cetera.

3.title: Condom Shopping
3.plot: Robert runs into Catherine at the drug store and gets into another argument. Edward tries to run the office without Jess and while feeling sick. Robert continues in his quest to bed Cassie.

4.title: Tis the Season
4.plot: Robert and Edward get locked in the basement. Catherine to the rescue?

imdb.plot outline: A Hot Mess follows the life of self absorbed attorney Robert Stevens as he navigates personal turmoil and manages his law office. His unlucky in love secretary Jess, is a tough New York girl, that is the real boss of the office keeping him in line. The office environment is pure chaos, with Robert's ex-wife, Michele, coming and going, his teenage son, Warren, working there part-time, law school intern, Edward, trying to learn from the worst mentor of all time, his one night stand, Catherine, fast becoming his perennial nemesis and his new love interest, Cassie, hates him. It's sure to be a fun ride.
imdb.title: A Hot Mess
plot: _A Hot Mess_ (qv) follows the life of self absorbed attorney Robert Stevens as he navigates personal turmoil and manages his law office. His unlucky in love secretary Jess, is a tough New York girl, that is the real boss of the office keeping him in line. The office environment is pure chaos, with Robert's ex-wife, Michele, coming and going, his teenage son, Warren, working there part-time, law school intern, Edward, trying to learn from the worst mentor of all time, his one night stand, Catherine, fast becoming his perennial nemesis and his new love interest, Cassie, hates him.
